Name: Wisp
Script: End Turn: //First Words: I'm really excited by all this new equipment!|New things must be good things!||I asked Lady Luck if I could use one of the new things|but she said modded equipment is for CHEATERS|and the balance is completely wack!!||I wish I knew what that meant!
First Words: I asked Lady Luck if I could use one of the new items|but she said modded equipment is for CHEATERS|and the balance is completely wack!!||Do you know what any of that means?
Last Words 1: Daaaa! Daaa! Da-doo! Bounce bounce!||I love it when you contestants win[;]|your victory song is so much fun!
Last Words (if they win): YOU AREN'T VERY GOOD AT THIS GAME!|YAY!||OR MAYBE YOU ARE! YAY!
Last Words Endgame: BOUNCE BOUNCE BOUNCE!||Yippeeee! You can do it!

Name: Keymaster
Last Words 1: Oh[;] nicely done! Really solid fighting there!||You're going to make such a great minion once you lose!
Last Words 2: Oh[;] another really neat fight!||I wasn't NEARLY this good back when I|was a contestant!||You're going to be a top-ranked minion in no time!
Last Words Endgame: You're getting tougher by the minute[;] aren't you?||You know[;] with all my lockpicking technique[;]|I could just sneak into Yolanda's place and|steal a weapon that would take you down|at the flick of a wrist...||Kidding! Kidding.|I don't believe in taking the easy way out like that.

Name: Mimic
Script: Before Start Turn: /*it's implied mimic gets their equipment from the mystery box; so removing their 'get new equipment every turn' script seems logical once mystery box is snagged. this is mainly for the copycat? rule but it could be a good edge case with reversal or whatever. (ed: copycat? no longer swaps equipment but rather has you overwrite one of your equipment w/ an enemy equipment... awkward!)*/ if(self.hasequipment(~Mystery Box~) # self.hasequipment(~Mystery Box+~)) { self.setvar(~mimichasbox~|true); var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } removeequipment(~Mystery Box~ + x); giveequipment(rand(loadtext(~diceydungeons/mysterybox~)) + x | true | false); } else { self.setvar(~mimichasbox~|false); }
Script: End Turn: if(self.getvar(~mimichasbox~) == true) { var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } for(eq in self.equipment) { if(loadtext(~diceydungeons/mysterybox~).indexOf(eq.name) != -1) { x = eq.namemodifier; removeequipment(eq.name + eq.namemodifier); } } giveequipment(~Mystery Box~ + x | true | false); } //some more edgecases to ensure 1. wizard? rule has an effect on mimic (and bully rule by extension; huh) and 2. rat king? upgrade's mimic's items.
Last Words 1: Hey[;] I've got some super-comfy cushions|here if you want to crawl in for a nap...
Last Words 2: Oh well done! But that fight must have taken it out of you.||Why not climb into this entirely non-suspicious|chest-shaped resting space and take a nap?

Name: Sorceress
Script: Before Combat: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } var sorceresstype = rand([FIRE| ICE| SHOCK| WEAKEN| VANISH]); if (sorceresstype == VANISH){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x| ~Sheer Will~  + x| ~Sheer Will~ + x | ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); } if (sorceresstype == FIRE){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x| ~Burning Light~  + x| ~Burning Light~ + x | ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }else if (sorceresstype == ICE){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x|  ~Ice Shard~  + x| ~Ice Shard~ + x | ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }else if (sorceresstype == SHOCK){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x|  ~Electric Shock~ + x | ~Electric Shock~ + x| ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }else if (sorceresstype == WEAKEN){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x|  ~Sonic Wave~ + x | ~Sonic Wave~ + x| ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }
Last Words 1: okay cool[;] thanks for the fight or whatever|sideeye.gif||ugh[;] this place is the worst

Name: Aurora
Script: Before Combat: if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { var weather = rand([~Hurricane+~|~Thunder Storm+~|~Heatwave+~|~Snowstorm+~|~Mist+~]); giveequipment([weather|weather|weather|~Mood Change+~]|true|false); } else { var weather = rand([~Hurricane~|~Thunder Storm~|~Heatwave~|~Snowstorm~|~Mist~]); giveequipment([weather|weather|weather|~Mood Change~]|true|false); }
Last Words 1: You haven't been here long yet[;] have you?||I can still smell the rain on you[;] I can see the last|glimpses of sunlight in your eyes.
Last Words 2: Was it cold when you entered the dungeons? Was there hail?|Are the snowstorms still looking for me?
Last Words Endgame: A fair fight. I'm sorry you didn't get your hearts desire[;] but|at least you got to see the towering clouds again.
